title: The Legendary Lox
itunes:title: The Legendary Lox
description:
This week we had the legendary Lox in the building where they spoke about their very entertaining versuz battle with Dipset and the behind the scene conversations that took place that night. Also, they spoke on brotherhood and new projects coming up in the future. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Dennis Schroeder for his decision to sign a 1 year 5.4 million deal with the Boston Celtics instead of the 4 year offer from the Lakers that would have been a 84 million year contract. Also, Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee" with one listener that clearly wants to have his cake and eat it to.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Dennis Schroeder for his decision to sign a 1 year 5.4 million deal with the Boston Celtics instead of the 4 year offer from the Lakers that would have been a 84 million year contract.
